message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay $950000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $975000 to make this deal work.  Let's find a middle ground.
Alice, I've considered your latest offer and I'm willing to pay $960000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product to both of us.
